dmca.title: Defamation/Cease and Desist Letter
dmca.body:
[redacted],

I represent [redacted]. Please direct all future communication concerning your business with [redacted] through my office, preferably in writing.

You are well aware that a dispute exists as to the validity of your claim against [redacted]. It is [redacted] position that you are simply harassing him and that your defamatory claims are causing damage to him personally and to his business. You have been asked to cease and desist before. I am asking again that you cease and desist with your defamation on the Internet and elsewhere. If you believe you have a valid claim, present it.

If you insist to continue with the harassment via email and/or web sites, [redacted] has authorized me to begin a law suit against you in the Lewis County courts. [redacted] will be asking for all damages caused by your actions and for reasonable attorney fees and costs.
